alert.note: Alert for Clay; Craighead; Greene; Mississippi; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 12 at 3:21PM CDT until October 13 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...RED FLAG CONDITIONS EXPECTED THURSDAY AFTERNOON OVER PORTIONS OF NORTHEAST ARKANSAS AND THE MISSOURI BOOTHEEL... .A combination of gusty northwest to north 20 ft winds, low relative humidity values between 20 to 25 percent, 10 hour fuel moisture values below 10 percent will result in Red Flag conditions over portions of Northeast Arkansas and the Missouri Bootheel on Thursday. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 8 PM CDT THURSDAY FOR STRONG AND GUSTY WINDS...LOW HUMIDITY...AND LOW FUEL MOISTURE FOR PORTIONS OF NORTHEAST ARKANSAS AND THE MISSOURI BOOTHEEL... The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 1 PM to 8 PM CDT Thursday. * WIND...20 foot winds between 12 to 20 mph. * HUMIDITY...relative humidity values below 25 percent. * 10 HOUR FUEL MOISTURE...10 percent or less * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
